metadata.description: Comprehensive MCP server for NixOS system management, AI provider integration, emergency response, code analysis, and knowledge management
metadata.author: SecureLLM Team

categories.name: Provider & API Management
categories.description: LLM provider connectivity testing, configuration validation, security auditing, and TLS certificate generation

categories.name: Emergency Framework
categories.description: Critical system rescue operations for CPU, memory, SWAP emergencies; process termination and resource cleanup

categories.name: Laptop Defense Framework
categories.description: Advanced thermal monitoring, forensic analysis, and hardware protection for laptop systems

categories.name: Web Search & Research
categories.description: Multi-source web searching, NixOS package lookup, GitHub exploration, and deep research with fact-checking

categories.name: Code Analysis & Debugging
categories.description: TypeScript/JavaScript code analysis, complexity metrics, dead code detection, and network debugging

categories.name: SSH & Remote Access
categories.description: Secure remote command execution, file transfers, tunnel management, and multi-hop SSH connections

categories.name: Browser Automation
categories.description: Puppeteer-based browser automation for web scraping, form interaction, and search aggregation

categories.name: Development Tools
categories.description: Code linting (ESLint/Ruff), formatting (Prettier/Black), test execution, and GitHub Actions management

categories.name: Package Management
categories.description: NixOS package debugging, downloading from multiple sources, and automatic configuration generation

categories.name: Knowledge Management
categories.description: Persistent knowledge storage with sessions, tagging, full-text search, and intelligent compaction

categories.name: Secure Execution
categories.description: Isolated command execution in ephemeral Nix sandboxes with package dependency injection

categories.name: System Management & Cleanup
categories.description: Smart file cleanup, duplicate detection, log rotation, directory organization, and cataloging

categories.name: Wildcard Commands
categories.description: Natural language command templates for common system operations with automatic safety checks

categories.name: Rate Limiting & Monitoring
categories.description: Performance monitoring, rate limit tracking, semantic cache metrics, and Nix package cache stats

resources.description: Dynamic resources providing system status, metrics, and documentation

semantic_cache.description: Intelligent caching for repeated queries with semantic similarity matching

context_management.description: Proactive context tracking and multi-step reasoning support

rate_limiting.description: Smart rate limiting per provider with burst support and adaptive throttling

request_deduplication.description: Automatic deduplication of identical concurrent requests

tool_metrics.description: Detailed execution metrics for all tools including latency, errors, and usage patterns

project_watcher.description: Automatic detection of project changes for proactive suggestions

knowledge_persistence.description: SQLite-based knowledge storage with intelligent tiered archival and LLM summarization

security.description: Multi-layer security with sandboxed execution, secret scanning, and comprehensive audit trails

performance.lazy_loading: Tools load on-demand to reduce memory footprint
performance.async_operations: Non-blocking I/O for all network and file operations

use_cases: NixOS system administration and package management
Emergency system recovery and thermal protection
Automated browser testing and web scraping

notes.build_artifacts: The build/ directory is ignored by git. Run 'npm run build' to generate before deployment.
notes.knowledge_db: Knowledge database path is configurable via KNOWLEDGE_DB_PATH environment variable.
notes.thermal_protection: Laptop defense tools are specifically designed for laptops with thermal constraints.
notes.wildcard_commands: Natural language commands are parsed and executed with safety validation.
notes.provider_keys: API keys are loaded from environment variables; recommend using SOPS for secret management.
notes.auto_detection: Project root and hostname are auto-detected if not explicitly configured.
notes.cache_cleanup: Semantic cache automatically cleans expired entries every 15 minutes.
